evolution-graph.description: Highly customizable, animated and responsive evolution graph implementation. The package is used to create flexible data visualizations and present evolution relationships between entities.

react-ts-boilerplate.description: WIP - Boilerplate for React.js applications built with Mobx and Chakra UI.

podjs.description: PodJS is a podcast app built with Next.js, MobX and Chakra UI.

clockify-teams.description: Team management app integrated with Clockify and built with React.js, MobX and Material UI. Used to generate warnings and send email reports about collaborators time entries.

react-native-ts-boilerplate.description: WIP - Boilerplate for React Native applications built with MobX and Native Base.

svelte-ts-boilerplate.description: WIP - Boilerplate for Svelte.js applications built with Svelte Material UI.
